title: Ask Peter: The big AI question

content:

title: Govt plans to set up AI centre of excellence at IIT-P
description: Patna: The state govt plans to set up a state-of-the-art Artificial Intelligence Centre of Excellence on the IIT-Patna campus in Bihta at an estimated.
content: Patna: The state govt plans to set up a state-of-the-art Artificial Intelligence Centre of Excellence on the IIT-Patna campus in Bihta at an estimated cost of around Rs60 crore. The proposal was recommended at the second high-level meeting of the Bih... [2118 chars]

title: Chile launches Latin America’s first generative AI model
description: After nearly three years of development, Chile launched Latam-GPT, an open-source artificial intelligence model built with data from Latin America.
content:
SANTIAGO, Chile, Feb. 11 (UPI) -- After nearly three years of development, Chile officially launched Latam-GPT, an open-source artificial intelligence model built with data from Latin America to reflect the region's culture and history.

title: Challenge is not whether to use AI, but how to use it: Justice Karol
description: New Delhi: Courts must ensure that the use of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in the justice system supplements — and does not replace — human decision-m.
content: New Delhi: Courts must ensure that the use of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in the justice system supplements — and does not replace — human decision-making, a Supreme Court judge said on Thursday. "The challenge for institutions, including courts, is... [1147 chars]

title: Maharashtra To Host Global AI For Agriculture Conference In Mumbai On February 22-23
description: Maharashtra will host the Global Conference on Artificial Intelligence in Agriculture and Investment Summit (AI for Agri 2026) on February 22–23 in Mumbai. Organized under the state’s AI policy, the event aims to promote data-driven farming. With Rs 500 crore allocated, global institutions, experts, and investors will discuss AI innovation, digital infrastructure, and farmer-focused technologies.
content: In a major step toward transforming agriculture through advanced technology, the Maharashtra government will host the “Global Conference on Artificial Intelligence in Agriculture and Investment Summit (AI for Agri 2026)” on February 22 and 23 at the ... [2135 chars]

title: Meta to Spend More Than $10 Billion on Indiana-Based Data Center
description: Meta Platforms Inc. said it will spend more than $10 billion to build a data center campus in Lebanon, Indiana, ranking it among the company’s largest artificial intelligence infrastructure investments to date.
content:
Meta Platforms Inc. said it will spend more than $10 billion to build a data center campus in Lebanon, Indiana, ranking it among the company’s largest artificial intelligence infrastructure investments to date.

title: UK Supreme Court ruling on patents and AI is boost for innovation, lawyers say
description: An artificial neural network, a type of artificial intelligence which can engage in machine learning, can be patented, the United Kingdom's Supreme Court ruled on Wednesday in a decision welcomed by lawyers as a boost for patenting AI innovations.
